attributes.action: I want parliament to make supermarkets more accountable for there high prices.
attributes.additional_details: Supermarkets are taking advantage and putting profit against human decicency and I'm tired of it.
attributes.background: I want parliament to implement law that prevents supermarkets increasing daily essential items to whatever the feel like. My local Aldi have made a decision to increase milk to £1.55. This is an essential item. 10p may not seem a lot but it is. Many households have tight budgets.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Ensure companies don't make excess profits to bring prices down to a fair amount
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714048
